column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////True Chicagoans really know their pizza.  Forget the touristy places well known in this city.  This place has the best pizza. You'll never want to eat anywhere else again.  The sauce recipe really makes this pizza standout amongst its competitors.  If you want a fantastic pizza for a good price then this place is where it's at!  Every time I've had their pizza the taste and quality of the pizza has been consistent.  You can never go wrong with this place!
